ConflictException: There was a conflict error. Please retry later
GoneException: There was an error. Please retry later
PayloadTooLargeException: Request payload too large to be processed
UnsupportedMediaTypeException: Unsupported media type. Please use the supported format
InternalServerErrorException: There was an intrnal server error
MethodNotAllowedException: Bad method error. Please use the correct http method
NotImplementedException: Bad method error. Please use the correct http method
BadGatewayException: Service unavilble. Please try again later
ServiceUnavailableException: Service unavilble. Please try again later
GatewayTimeoutException: Gateway timedout. Please try again later
